alert.note: Alert for Branch; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 5:09PM EDT until August 03 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... St. Joseph County in southwestern Michigan... Branch County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 509 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Vicksburg to Bristol, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sturgis, Coldwater, Three Rivers, Bronson, Constantine, Quincy, Union City, White Pigeon, Centreville, Colon, Nottawa, Girard, Flowerfield, Fawn River, Mottville, Batavia, Leonidas, Mendon, Burr Oak and Gilead. This includes Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 5 and 21. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
